channel.title: Error in compiler

item.title: Error in compiler
item.dc:creator: @wookiezz wookiezz
item.description:
@wookiezz wrote:

so i try to add a simple command to tele, here it is

if(command.startsWith(“staffzone”)&& playerRights >= 2){
teleportToX = 1000;
teleportToY = 1000;
sendMessage(“Youve teleported to staff zone!”);

}

its command.startsWith because thats what the others are…
and i go to client.java to put it in.

i search for a code, and find one, heres the code i put it under

if(command.startsWith(“clicks”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Dalton”))) {

if(!LoggingClicks) {
LoggingClicks = true;
}
if(LoggingClicks) {
sendMessage("Logging clicks set to false");
LoggingClicks = false;
}

}

now heres some differences that might cause an error, || after playerRights, instead of {
thers 2 } at the ending instead of 1

but the biggest error in my mind, is when i go to put it, at the end of the code, i go to the beggining of the next code, and press enter, then i paste my code were the blank line is, i save, compile and when its compiling it puts up a bunch of errors, at the end saying “100 errors”

if someone could help that would be great

thanks,
wookiezz
